name: veilpay
description: VeilPay - Privacy-preserving payroll with ZK proofs

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "NODE,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run node" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --names "NODE,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run node" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:circuits && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:circuits && npm run test:contracts
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:contracts && npm run install:circuits
scripts.deploy:all: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-all.ts --network localhost
scripts.clean: npm run clean:contracts && npm run clean:circuits
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:contracts
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:circuits && npm run compile:contracts
